name: Fruit Hiting
description:
Collect fruits and open new controllers. Check your reflex and speed. Compete with your friends and fight for first place. Collect fruit and get an achievement. Share score with your friends. Free to play Fruits Hit best on your phone. Enjoy life with the Fruits Hit.

Can you collect 500 fruits?

Key features:

* Easy to play
* Nice graphic fruits
* Simple gameplay
* Pleasant entertainment
